name: Brewer (itch)
description:
In Brewer, you play as an apprentice mage tasked with heading into the nearby forest to catch critters and use them to brew potions for the town apothecary. You have heard stories of a mythical golden critter that lives in the forest, you are determined to catch the golden critter to prove your worth as an apprentice mage.
